label: bike
caption: A young boy, his face set in a determined expression, expertly navigates a BMX bike through a makeshift obstacle course in his backyard. The sun casts dappled shadows on the grass as he picks up speed, performing a smooth wheelie before smoothly transitioning back to regular pedaling. A few discarded bike helmets and tools lie scattered around the area, indicating that this is a frequent training ground for the boy's cycling skills.
